name: show-hex-of-binary-file
description: Show Hex String preview of Binary File

commands.title: Select or Input absolute path of a binary file to show hex string

show-hex-of-binary-file.pickType.description: Set the binary file pick type, "select" to open file dialog to select on or multiple binary file, "input" to input the path

show-hex-of-binary-file.readOnly.description: Set the binary file hex string show type, the default value is readonly

show-hex-of-binary-file.checkInterval.description: Set check interval of the modification of the binary file in milliseconds, the minimal interval is 500
